description: WordPluck is a fast-paced typing game where words fall from the top of the screen — and you’ve got seconds to type them before they hit the ground! Sharpen your typing speed, boost your accuracy, and challenge your reflexes. Simple to play, hard to master. Perfect for brain training or casual fun!
name: Word Pluck -Typing Test
